original_text: Saul's son Ish-Bosheth heard the news that Abner had died in Hebron. Then he felt very frightened. All the people in Israel became afraid.
korean_text: 사울의 아들 이스보셋은 아브넬이 헤브론에서 죽었다 함을 듣고 손의 맥이 풀렸고 온 이스라엘이 놀라니라

sentences.original_text: Saul's son Ish-Bosheth heard the news
sentences.korean_translation: 사울의 아들 이스보셋이 그 소식을 들었고

sentences.original_text: that Abner had died in Hebron
All the people in Israel became afraid
